channel.title: Xbow acceleration?
channel.description: I have no idea if this was brought up, but I'm having a serious issue with the crossbow's zoom function. I'm pretty sure it's not really a glitch, but it sure is a problem. The aim acceleration doesn't decrease when you zoom in, resulting in the view snapping everywhere when you nudge the mouse even a little bit. I'm not sure if there's a way to compensate for this (I mean, it was in Hl2, but still), but it would be greatly appreciated if someone came up with a solution. I haven't checked recently, but I think the suit zoom and magnum zoom may have the same problem.
